channel.title: Comments for page "Terri Lvl. 3"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Terri Lvl. 3"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Everyone sees it.

"Terri stops by to toss a <Kaiju Drop> to <Villager> for doing a total of <Damage> Damage!" shows up in the defeat message in the Village logs.

item.title: Does everyone see that you are using couning coup/got the drop in your village or just you?
item.content:encoded:
i'm not sure but i think i remember getting a second item from the kage the same day i got the drop from terri so i ended up with two of the same drops. but still, it was a long time ago and i'm not sure so is this possible?

& can everyone seee that you won a drop with terri or just the kage OR is it just you who knows? if so, then i could see this as a way to become rich really quick. just sell your second drop in the marketplace

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Define 'cannot level her up':

"Your ally appears stronger, but they do not level up at this time" message after passing the mission = Try again
Lack of a "One of your allies may level up here" message = You either don't have Terri2, or you already have Terri3
Can't pass the mission = use better jutsu

item.title: Prob
item.content:encoded: I am season 4. I want to get Terri LV 3 but the page says you can only get her on the post threads mission. My problem is that my alt Season 3, got threads and now I get that mission and I cannot level her up. Any advice would be helpfull.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Ok, since coup doesn't work if you have the item now if someone doesn't have it, what happens if everyone does have it?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: will a kage with terri3 get both the kage drop and terri's drop?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
From what i have heard yes you can get her in season 2 if you have Survived the Impossible.

No you can't. I'm season 2 and I have Survived the Impossible. Even with crank 3 you can't get her untill season 3!

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: From what i have heard yes you can get her in season 2 if you have Survived the Impossible.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: but my question comes from me having the Survived the Impossible item and how it gives me +1 crank

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
According to the front page announcement for the Crank, it should require Crank 3 or above. Since Season 2 only unlocks up to Crank 2, this is how it's been limited to Season 3+ now.

Edit: Due to being changed back to being by season afterwards, Terri 3 can only be obtained by Season 3+ ninja. They can obtain it at any crank level.

item.title: with the crank stuff
item.content:encoded: so here's my question for anyone who finds out about it. Does it still require season 3 to get her or 3 cranks? I was one of the few in Alt Village when it when KABOOM. I have 3 cranks and was wondering if it is possible to get it now? Either way I plan on testing out the theory myself.
